'''Ciaran Bermingham''' is an actor. He recently appeared in an episode of ''[[wikipedia:The Tudors (TV series)|The Tudors]]''.

In ''[[Game of Thrones]]'' he plays the role of [[Mord]]. He was announced in the role on 16 July 2010.
